text: @pritipatel So what are you doing about it ! STOP tomorrow’s protests . They have ruined their chances ! If you mean what they say then STOP them or are you waiting for a police officer to get killed or the NHS to be overwhelmed with COVID19 patients . And I’m a @BorisJohnson supporter !
